Notes: Remains at a resting position above the object's actual position. Once the player gets in its range, it will move to its actual position. This class supports ShapeModelNo models. The timed activation requires additional effect data under the UniqueName "Blur".

Obj_arg0.Name: Activation Range
Obj_arg0.Description: Specifies the activation range to the player's position. If set to -1, the model's diameter is used instead.

Obj_arg1.Name: Activation Time
Obj_arg1.Description: If Obj_arg7 is set, this specifies the timer until the block disappears again.

Obj_arg7.Name: Is Timed?
Obj_arg7.Description: If enabled, the block will be activated for a set amount of time only.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

GeneralPos.Description: 合体ブロック故郷点 specifies the resting position.
